Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4782 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4782 affecting package terraform for versions less than 1.3.2-19. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package terraform is earlier than 1.3.2-19, affected by CVE-2023-4782
